title: Biden to urge Trump 'not walk away from Ukraine' in key meeting
content: President-elect Donald Trump and President Joe Biden are scheduled to meet on Wednesday to discuss critical domestic and international policy matters, including the ongoing war in Ukraine. National security adviser Jake Sullivan revealed that Biden will emphasize the importance of a smooth power transition and advocate for continued support for Ukraine, a stance opposed by Trump and some Republican lawmakers.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump and President Joe Biden are scheduled to meet on Wednesday to discuss critical domestic and international policy matters, including the ongoing war in Ukraine. National security adviser Jake Sullivan revealed that Biden will emphasize the importance of a smooth power transition and advocate for continued support for Ukraine, a stance opposed by Trump and some Republican lawmakers.

title: New York Parks employee dies while battling wildfire in Orange Country
content: An 18-year-old New York parks employee tragically lost his life to a falling tree while combating a wildfire raging along the New York-New Jersey border. This fire, one of several sparked by dry conditions, has consumed thousands of acres, prompting air quality warnings in both states. Firefighters are battling to contain the blaze, which threatens numerous structures.
summary: An 18-year-old New York parks employee tragically lost his life to a falling tree while combating a wildfire raging along the New York-New Jersey border. This fire, one of several sparked by dry conditions, has consumed thousands of acres, prompting air quality warnings in both states. Firefighters are battling to contain the blaze, which threatens numerous structures.

title: ​'I wish him...': Nikki Haley responds to her exclusion from Trump's administration
content: Former US Ambassador Nikki Haley and former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo will not be part of Donald Trump's new administration, as confirmed by Trump himself. Despite this, Haley expressed her well wishes for Trump's success in her statement on X. Both were considered potential candidates for cabinet positions.
summary: Former US Ambassador Nikki Haley and former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo will not be part of Donald Trump's new administration, as confirmed by Trump himself. Despite this, Haley expressed her well wishes for Trump's success in her statement on X. Both were considered potential candidates for cabinet positions.

title: 'A pragmatic way': Vivek Ramaswamy backs Trump's mass deportation plans
content: Vivek Ramaswamy, a staunch supporter of Donald Trump, has voiced his support for the proposed mass deportation plan, deeming it a practical solution aligned with public sentiment. He emphasized prioritizing the deportation of illegal immigrants convicted of crimes, which he believes would constitute the most extensive deportation in history.
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy, a staunch supporter of Donald Trump, has voiced his support for the proposed mass deportation plan, deeming it a practical solution aligned with public sentiment. He emphasized prioritizing the deportation of illegal immigrants convicted of crimes, which he believes would constitute the most extensive deportation in history.

title: Amsterdam police use hologram to solve murder mystery of young sex worker
content: Amsterdam police are using a hologram of Bernadett Szabó, a Hungarian sex worker murdered in 2009, to seek new leads in her unsolved case. Szabó, a young mother, was found stabbed to death in her Red Light District workroom. Despite an extensive investigation, her killer remains unidentified.
summary: Amsterdam police are using a hologram of Bernadett Szabó, a Hungarian sex worker murdered in 2009, to seek new leads in her unsolved case. Szabó, a young mother, was found stabbed to death in her Red Light District workroom. Despite an extensive investigation, her killer remains unidentified.

title: Watch: Masked man tries to snatch Jewish child from father's arms in New York
content: A man attempted to kidnap a six-year-old boy from his father on a Brooklyn sidewalk on Saturday afternoon. The incident, caught on video, shows the suspect grabbing the child and lifting him into the air before the father intervened. The suspect fled and no injuries were reported. Police are investigating the incident.
summary: A man attempted to kidnap a six-year-old boy from his father on a Brooklyn sidewalk on Saturday afternoon. The incident, caught on video, shows the suspect grabbing the child and lifting him into the air before the father intervened. The suspect fled and no injuries were reported. Police are investigating the incident.

title: YouTuber Johnny Somali apologises for kissing statue honoring Korean wartime victims
content: American YouTuber Johnny Somali faces backlash and a police investigation in South Korea after posting a video of himself kissing a statue honoring Korean victims of wartime sexual slavery. Despite issuing an apology, Somali's sincerity is questioned due to other controversial content remaining on his social media accounts.
summary: American YouTuber Johnny Somali faces backlash and a police investigation in South Korea after posting a video of himself kissing a statue honoring Korean victims of wartime sexual slavery. Despite issuing an apology, Somali's sincerity is questioned due to other controversial content remaining on his social media accounts.

title: '​Not true': Ella Emhoff denies mental breakdown after stepmom Harris' presidential loss
content: Ella Emhoff, stepdaughter of Kamala Harris, refuted rumors about her mental health on Instagram, denying claims of hospitalization after Harris's election loss. Emhoff addressed the speculation sparked by her emotional response during Harris's concession speech, emphasizing the normalcy of expressing emotions and advocating for mental health awareness.
summary: Ella Emhoff, stepdaughter of Kamala Harris, refuted rumors about her mental health on Instagram, denying claims of hospitalization after Harris's election loss. Emhoff addressed the speculation sparked by her emotional response during Harris's concession speech, emphasizing the normalcy of expressing emotions and advocating for mental health awareness.

title: Fire breaks out on Japan navy ship, cause under investigation
content: A fire erupted in the engine room of the Japanese minesweeper Ukushima, prompting the evacuation of its crew. One crew member is currently missing, and another was hospitalized due to smoke inhalation. The cause of the fire, which occurred off the coast of Kyushu, remains under investigation. Efforts to extinguish the fire are ongoing.
summary: A fire erupted in the engine room of the Japanese minesweeper Ukushima, prompting the evacuation of its crew. One crew member is currently missing, and another was hospitalized due to smoke inhalation. The cause of the fire, which occurred off the coast of Kyushu, remains under investigation.  Efforts to extinguish the fire are ongoing.

title: Seven deadly wins: Trump takes Arizona for a clean sweep of the battleground states
content: Donald Trump has won the 2024 presidential election, securing victories in all seven battleground states and achieving 312 electoral votes. Despite facing a financially stronger opponent in Kamala Harris, Trump's triumph has raised concerns among Democrats and sparked discussions about potential policy shifts during his upcoming term.
summary: Donald Trump has won the 2024 presidential election, securing victories in all seven battleground states and achieving 312 electoral votes. Despite facing a financially stronger opponent in Kamala Harris, Trump's triumph has raised concerns among Democrats and sparked discussions about potential policy shifts during his upcoming term.

title: King Charles leads silence for UK war dead as Kate returns to public life
content: King Charles III, joined by dignitaries and the public, led Britain's Remembrance Sunday service, honoring fallen soldiers. Catherine, Princess of Wales, marked her return to royal duties following cancer treatment, attending the service and a commemorative concert alongside Prince William. Both Charles and Catherine have been undergoing treatment for cancer diagnoses this year.
summary: King Charles III, joined by dignitaries and the public, led Britain's Remembrance Sunday service, honoring fallen soldiers. Catherine, Princess of Wales, marked her return to royal duties following cancer treatment, attending the service and a commemorative concert alongside Prince William. Both Charles and Catherine have been undergoing treatment for cancer diagnoses this year.

title: 'Those responsible for indiscriminate killings': Bangladesh to seek Interpol 'red notices' for fugitive Hasina loyalists
content: Bangladesh said Sunday it would request an Interpol "red notice" alert for fugitive leaders of the ousted regime of former prime minister Sheikh Hasina, who was toppled in a revolution in August. Red notices issued by the global police body alert law enforcement agencies worldwide about fugitives.
summary: Bangladesh said Sunday it would request an Interpol "red notice" alert for fugitive leaders of the ousted regime of former prime minister Sheikh Hasina, who was toppled in a revolution in August. Red notices issued by the global police body alert law enforcement agencies worldwide about fugitives.

title: Palestinian hospital official says 17 killed in Israeli strike on northern Gaza
content: An Israeli airstrike on a home sheltering displaced Palestinians in the Jabaliya refugee camp in the northern Gaza Strip resulted in at least 17 fatalities, including nine women, as confirmed by Dr. Fadel Naim, director of Al-Ahly Hospital. Rescue operations are ongoing, suggesting a potential increase in the death toll. The Israeli military has not issued a statement yet.
summary: An Israeli airstrike on a home sheltering displaced Palestinians in the Jabaliya refugee camp in the northern Gaza Strip resulted in at least 17 fatalities, including nine women, as confirmed by Dr. Fadel Naim, director of Al-Ahly Hospital. Rescue operations are ongoing, suggesting a potential increase in the death toll. The Israeli military has not issued a statement yet.

title: Watch: Old video of Pakistan girl claiming to be Trump's daughter goes viral
content: A 2018 video of a Pakistani woman claiming to be Donald Trump's daughter has resurfaced online after his 2024 election victory. Speaking in Urdu, the woman alleges mistreatment by Melania Trump and claims Trump doubted her mother's parenting. Though initially unnoticed, the video is now being widely shared on social media.
summary: A 2018 video of a Pakistani woman claiming to be Donald Trump's daughter has resurfaced online after his 2024 election victory. Speaking in Urdu, the woman alleges mistreatment by Melania Trump and claims Trump doubted her mother's parenting. Though initially unnoticed, the video is now being widely shared on social media.

title: 'Did he drug me too?': Why Gisèle Pelicot's daughter fears she was also victimised
content: Gisèle Pelicot, 72, accused her ex-husband, Dominique, of drugging and orchestrating her rape by numerous men over a decade. Their daughter, Caroline Darian, discovered she might also be a victim after police found photos of her in evidence. Dominique admitted to drugging Gisèle and filming her assaults but denies abusing Darian.
summary: Gisèle Pelicot, 72, accused her ex-husband, Dominique, of drugging and orchestrating her rape by numerous men over a decade. Their daughter, Caroline Darian, discovered she might also be a victim after police found photos of her in evidence. Dominique admitted to drugging Gisèle and filming her assaults but denies abusing Darian.

title: Canada reports first human case of bird flu after teen tests positive
content: A teenager in British Columbia, Canada, has contracted the H5 strain of bird flu, marking the country's first confirmed human case. Health officials are investigating the source of the infection, suspecting animal-to-human transmission. While human cases are rare, the virus's ability to jump species raises concerns about its potential to mutate and spread among humans.
summary: A teenager in British Columbia, Canada, has contracted the H5 strain of bird flu, marking the country's first confirmed human case.  Health officials are investigating the source of the infection, suspecting animal-to-human transmission. While human cases are rare, the virus's ability to jump species raises concerns about its potential to mutate and spread among humans.

title: Iran man charged with plotting Trump assassination tasked with targeting Israeli tourists in Sri Lanka: US
content: The FBI has charged Iranian national and Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps operative Farhad Shakeri with plotting to assassinate former President Donald Trump and orchestrate attacks on Israeli tourists in Sri Lanka. Shakeri, currently a fugitive believed to be in Tehran, was allegedly tasked with organizing a mass shooting in October 2024.
summary: The FBI has charged Iranian national and Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps operative Farhad Shakeri with plotting to assassinate former President Donald Trump and orchestrate attacks on Israeli tourists in Sri Lanka. Shakeri, currently a fugitive believed to be in Tehran, was allegedly tasked with organizing a mass shooting in October 2024.

title: FEMA fires employee for instructing hurricane relief team 'to skip houses advertising Trump'
content: A FEMA staff member was fired for instructing disaster response teams in Florida to avoid homes displaying pro-Trump signs following Hurricane Milton. FEMA Administrator Deanne Criswell condemned the action, deeming it a violation of the agency's core values. An investigation is underway, and Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has launched a state-level inquiry into the incident.
summary: A FEMA staff member was fired for instructing disaster response teams in Florida to avoid homes displaying pro-Trump signs following Hurricane Milton. FEMA Administrator Deanne Criswell condemned the action, deeming it a violation of the agency's core values. An investigation is underway, and Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has launched a state-level inquiry into the incident.

title: Putin signs treaty with North Korea, strengthening military ties amid Ukraine conflict
content: Russia and North Korea have formalized a strategic partnership, including a mutual defense agreement. The treaty, ratified by Putin, follows reports of North Korean arms supplies to Russia and the deployment of North Korean troops to Ukraine. This development has raised concerns among Western nations, particularly as Ukrainian forces face mounting pressure from a renewed Russian offensive.
summary: Russia and North Korea have formalized a strategic partnership, including a mutual defense agreement. The treaty, ratified by Putin, follows reports of North Korean arms supplies to Russia and the deployment of North Korean troops to Ukraine.  This development has raised concerns among Western nations, particularly as Ukrainian forces face mounting pressure from a renewed Russian offensive.

title: Pakistan man stages kidnapping after killing son; arrested
content: A man in Lahore, Pakistan, was arrested for allegedly murdering his seven-year-old son and staging a kidnapping. The child's body was found buried at their residence. In other incidents, a woman suffered severe burns after her husband allegedly threw acid on her, and a man killed his wife and seven children due to financial hardship.
summary: A man in Lahore, Pakistan, was arrested for allegedly murdering his seven-year-old son and staging a kidnapping. The child's body was found buried at their residence. In other incidents, a woman suffered severe burns after her husband allegedly threw acid on her, and a man killed his wife and seven children due to financial hardship.
